posts.excerpt: 3x3迷惑扫雷 提取码: i03t管你赢了输了，我就是没反应 :]源码有味，迷惑加倍
posts.text: 3x3迷惑扫雷 提取码: i03t管你赢了输了，我就是没反应 :]源码有味，迷惑加倍  i As Long '意大利炮爆米花Dim z As LongDim a1, a2, a3, a4, a5, a6, a7, a8, a9 As Boolean' 我就不用数组:\ 怎样Private Sub Command10_Click()a1 = Int(Rnd() - 0.3)a2 = Int(Rnd() - 0.3)a3 = Int(Rnd() - 0.3)a4 = Int(Rnd() - 0.3)a5 = Int(Rnd() - 0.3)a6 = Int(Rnd() - 0.3)a7 = Int(Rnd() - 0.3)a8 = Int(Rnd() - 0.3)a9 = Int(Rnd() - 0.3)Command1.Caption = (viod) '我偏要写viod:\ 怎样Command2.Caption = (viod)Command3.Caption = (viod)Command4.Caption = (viod)Command5.Caption = (viod)Command6.Caption = (viod)Command7.Caption = (viod)Command8.Caption = (viod)Command9.Caption = (viod)i = 0Label2.Caption = "0"End SubPrivate Sub Command1_Click()z = 0If a2 = True & a4 = True Then 'if走起z = z + 2End IfIf a2 = True Or a4 = True Thenz = z + 1End IfCommand1.Caption = Str(z)If a1 = True Then Command1.Caption = "*" '给你整个好康的i = i + 1Label2.Caption = Str(i)End SubPrivate Sub Command2_Click()z = 0If a1 = True & a3 = True & a5 = True Then '手动穷举z = z + 3End IfIf a1 = True & a3 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a1 = True & a5 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a3 = True & a5 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a1 = True Or a3 = True Or a5 = True Thenz = z + 1End IfCommand2.Caption = Str(z)If a2 = True Then Command2.Caption = "*"i = i + 1Label2.Caption = Str(i)End SubPrivate Sub Command3_Click()z = 0If a2 = True & a6 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a2 = True Or a6 = True Thenz = z + 1End IfCommand3.Caption = Str(z)If a3 = True Then Command3.Caption = "*"i = i + 1Label2.Caption = Str(i)End SubPrivate Sub Command4_Click()z = 0If a1 = True & a5 = True & a7 = True Thenz = z + 3End IfIf a1 = True & a5 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a1 = True & a7 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a5 = True & a7 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a1 = True Or a5 = True Or a7 = True Thenz = z + 1End IfCommand4.Caption = Str(z)If a4 = True Then Command4.Caption = "*"i = i + 1Label2.Caption = Str(i)End SubPrivate Sub Command5_Click()z = 0If a2 = True & a4 = True & a6 = True & a8 = True Thenz = z + 4End IfIf a2 = True & a4 = True & a6 = True Thenz = z + 3End IfIf a2 = True & a4 = True & a8 = True Thenz = z + 3End IfIf a4 = True & a6 = True & a8 = True Thenz = z + 3End IfIf a2 = True & a4 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a2 = True & a6 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a2 = True & a8 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a4 = True & a6 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a4 = True & a8 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a6 = True & a8 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a2 = True Or a4 = True Or a6 = True Or a8 = True Thenz = z + 1End IfCommand5.Caption = Str(z)If a5 = True Then Command5.Caption = "*"i = i + 1Label2.Caption = Str(i)End SubPrivate Sub Command6_Click()z = 0If a3 = True & a5 = True & a9 = True Thenz = z + 3End IfIf a3 = True & a5 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a3 = True & a9 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a5 = True & a7 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a3 = True Or a5 = True Or a9 = True Thenz = z + 1End IfCommand6.Caption = Str(z)If a6 = True Then Command6.Caption = "*"i = i + 1Label2.Caption = Str(i)End SubPrivate Sub Command7_Click()z = 0If a4 = True & a8 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a4 = True Or a8 = True Thenz = z + 1End IfCommand7.Caption = Str(z)If a7 = True Then Command7.Caption = "*"i = i + 1Label2.Caption = Str(i)End SubPrivate Sub Command8_Click()z = 0If a5 = True & a7 = True & a9 = True Thenz = z + 3End IfIf a5 = True & a7 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a5 = True & a9 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a7 = True & a9 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a5 = True Or a7 = True Or a9 = True Thenz = z + 1End IfCommand8.Caption = Str(z)If a8 = True Then Command8.Caption = "*"i = i + 1Label2.Caption = Str(i)End SubPrivate Sub Command9_Click()z = 0If a6 = True & a8 = True Thenz = z + 2End IfIf a6 = True Or a8 = True Thenz = z + 1End IfCommand9.Caption = Str(z)If a9 = True Then Command9.Caption = "*"i = i + 1Label2.Caption = Str(i) '洗脑结束End Sub

posts.title: Hello 3.0
posts.text: 嘿，别来无恙！ Let’s Hello 3.0 this time. 12345public class HelloWorld { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello 3.0"); }} 1234567#include <iostream>using namespace std;int main(){ cout << "Hello 3.0" << endl; return 0;} 123456#include <stdio.h>int main(){ printf("Hello 3.0\n"); return 0;} 1print("Hello 3.0") 1document.write("<h1>Hello 3.0</h1>"); 12345678<!DOCTYPE html><html> <body> <?php echo "Hello 3.0"; ?> </body></html> Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover. ——Mark Twain

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
